means: 反复有节奏地喊叫（或唱等）
[人名] [英格兰人、苏格兰人姓氏] 钱特 Cant的变体

sentence.Network_en: He was greeted by the chant of "Judas! Judas!".
sentence.Network_cn: 人们看见他就反复不停地喊：“犹大！犹大！”

sentence.Network_en: Her father had been a mer-chant seaman, absent for much of her child-hood.
sentence.Network_cn: 她爸爸曾是商船船员，在她童年的大部分时光里都不在她身边。

sentence.Network_en: Worldly people chant the name of God, but there is no zeal behind it.
sentence.Network_cn: 世人唱着神的圣名，却没有了热诚。

list.abs: 格列高利圣咏（Gregorian Chant） 其节奏遵循人的自然呼吸节律，给人一种空旷辽远的感觉，有助于工作，提高注意力，减轻焦虑。 …
34. 格里高利圣咏（Gregorian chant，英）一译"素歌"。罗马教会所保存并沿用至今的最古老的宗教歌曲集，以教皇格里高利一世命名。

...电脑多媒体,书本,图片等,引导学生接触童谣,歌曲,节奏韵文(jazz chants),简易故事,卡通等,来训练学生听与说之能力.教学时应尽量以.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'sing'): from Old French chanter 'sing', from Latin cantare, frequentative of canere 'sing'

entry.def: A chant is a word or group of words that is repeated over and over again.

example.ex: He was greeted by the chant of 'Judas! Judas!'.
example.tran: 人们看见他就反复不停地喊：“犹大！犹大！”

entry.def: A chant is a religious song or prayer that is sung on only a few notes.
If you chant something or if you chant, you repeat the same words over and over again.

example.tran: 示威者们反复喊着口号。

example.ex: The crowd chanted 'We are with you.'...
example.tran: 人群一再呼喊：“我们支持你。”

entry.def: If you chant or if you chant something, you sing a religious song or prayer.

example.ex: Mr Sharma lit incense and chanted Sanskrit mantras.
example.tran: 夏尔马先生点上香，念起梵文咒语。

means.word_mean: 1. a repetitive song in which as many syllables as necessary are assigned to a single tone
1. recite with musical intonation; recite as a chant or a psalm;
2. utter monotonously and repetitively and rhythmically;

sentences.sentence: "The students chanted the same slogan over and over again"

auth_sentence.content: To the now-familiar chant of Chi chi chi!

auth_sentence.content: The crew launch into a robust team chant.

means.word_mean: 反复有节奏地喊叫(或唱等)

sentences.cn: 人群有节奏地反复呼喊着口号。

jushi.english: The crowd chanted slogans and waved banners.
jushi.chinese: 人群有节奏地反复呼喊着口号并挥舞着旗帜。
